jobDescription: We are currently hiring for an experienced Administrative Assistant / Bookkeeper to help support a Property Management / Private Equity Real Estate Investment Firmin Redwood City. This is a high intensity, fast paced organization that offers generous perks, and significant opportunity for growth. Responsibilities:- Answer and direct phone calls to the appropriate parties- Organize and schedule appointments/events for Principles - Plan and organize meetings and take detailed minutes- Write and answer email, correspondence memos, letters, faxes and forms- Update and maintain organizational policies and procedures- Collect and reconcile company contractor expense reports- Provide general support to visitors and act as the point of contact for internal and external clients- Daily /Weekly Data Entry- Receive, verify, and process accounts payable- Review, verity, and invoice and accounts receivable- Receive payments, customer reconciliation- Reconcile multiple account statements- Manage cash flow- Process paychecks, - Production of weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements- Consult regularly with internal and external accountant for tax planning- Provide additional support as neededWorking hours: 8 AM - 5 PMSkills:- Proven experience as an administrative assistant, virtual assistant or office admin assistant- 3-5 years full charge bookkeeping experience- Knowledge of office management systems and procedures- Working knowledge of office equipment, like printers and fax machines- Proficiency in MS Office (MS Excel, in particular)- Excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize work- Attention to detail and problem-solving skills- Excellent written and verbal communication skills- Strong organizational skills with the ability to multi-taskAttributes:- Strong attention to detail with a commitment to producing high quality work- Excellent and practiced time management skills- Professional, positive, reliable and hardworkingHours: 20-30 hours per week, flexible days and hoursCompensation: Based on experience
